Comments_List: Learned about fronteirs of research in the field
exposure to research and scholars in the field

The speakers and topics are generally great. I know the culture in econ is to constantly interrupt and ask questions, but I felt that too often we would get hung up early in the presentation - often fairly aggressive questions are asked about methods and what the speaker is planning to do when they are still on the intro slide which seems inappropriate and counterproductive. I think the faculty should think critically about the seminar atmosphere they want to encourage.
Could have had a more full schedule of speakers.
Necessary class for students wanting to do research in the field
take if want exposure to PhD level research seminar
